name: The Ruins Of Ishgar!
description:
Game Description:

  • Explore The Ruins of Ishgar in this atmospheric 2.5D platformer.
  • You are a small species of alien explorers to travel the Earth and search for its mysteries. Due to your size and advanced technology, humans have not discovered your presence. 
  • During your adventures, you have found the abandoned Sun Temple and are now searching for its treasures. 

How To Play:

  • Collect the coins and avoid the obstacles.
  • A, D - Rotate left and right
  • Spacebar - Thrust rocket ship forward

Credits:

  • Lost Temple Pack
  • DaFonts Fancy Pack
  • Low Poly Foliage Pack
  • Low Poly Cartoon Pack

I made this game using only free assets from the Unity Asset Store :)
